QuestData.Title: Misery
QuestData.Description: While you are in the water below, you should slay Nahassa, the mortbreath patriarch. He suffers. I can feel his death cries ululating up to the surface of the lagoon.$b$bFind his cave, and put him out of his misery. Not because it will solve Marista's crocolisk problem. Simply out of mercy.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Even a great beast deserves mercy.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please, $n. Even the great beasts of this world have a right to die in dignity.
QuestData.RewardText: Nahassa's fevered suffering has come to an end.

Objectives.Objective: Put Nahassa out of his misery
